ingredients.ingredient: 1 (4 roll) package Hawaiian bread rolls, split

cookingTips: Toast bread lightly before adding cheese to prevent sogginess
Sprinkle sugar sparingly for sweet and savory balance
Cook on medium heat for melted cheese without burning bread
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This sweet-savory combo works best with buttered toasting. Do you have a panini press or will you use a skillet?
